Name Rascal/Libraries/Scripting/eval

Function
  1. value eval(str command) throws Timeout
  2. value eval(str command, int duration) throws Timeout
  3. value eval(list[str] commands) throws Timeout
  4. value eval(list[str] commands, int duration) throws Timeout
Description Evaluate a command or a list of commands and return the value of the last command that is executed. An optional duration argument may be present to limit the time (in milliseconds) the execution may take. By default, the duration is set to 1000 ms.
